questions.name: Question 1
questions.statement:
True or false? If you create a field (also known as an 'instance') variable (see below), then the variable is part of the activity and will live for as long as the activity.
class ABC{
  View Pointer;
}

questions.name: Question 2
questions.statement:
Write the missing code to enable the web zoom controls.

myWebView._________.setBuiltInZoomControls(true);

questions.name: Question 3
questions.statement: Select all that are true. The package line:
variants: Cannot appear twice in the same Java file
Appears at the top of the Java file (before the import and class definition)
Must agree with the directory path of the Java file
Appears at the end of the Java file (after the class definition)

questions.name: Question 4
questions.statement: Which of the following starts an Activity, 'HighScoreScreen.java' in the same package?

questions.name: Question 1
questions.statement: To build an app based on static webpage content, the content should be placed in which directory?

questions.name: Question 2
questions.statement: The correct URL to refer to index.html in the assets directory is:
